prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a striking yellow coat and purple accents that resembles a powerful feline.
I want to see a legendary Pokemon that has thunderbolt powers and a majestic appearance with vivid colors.
Generate a creature that embodies the essence of a storm, complete with lightning-like features and a fierce expression.
Make a quadruped Pokemon that has a unique combination of yellow fur and a flowing mane, evoking speed and agility.
Imagine a mythical beast that roams the mountains, electrifying its surroundings with a vibrant and eye-catching design.
Design a Pokemon that channels electric energy, featuring dramatic color contrasts and notable feline characteristics.
Show me a Pokemon with an electrifying presence, showcasing both powerful electric abilities and stunning visual traits.
